statements: SELECT * FROM geofencing_areas;
SELECT area_name, latitude, longitude FROM geofencing_areas;
SELECT area_id, radius FROM geofencing_areas;
SELECT * FROM geofencing_areas WHERE area_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT area_name, latitude, longitude, radius FROM geofencing_areas WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT area_name, latitude, longitude, radius FROM geofencing_areas WHERE area_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM geofencing_areas WHERE radius > 100 AND latitude BETWEEN 30.0 AND 40.0;
SELECT area_name, latitude, longitude, radius FROM geofencing_areas ORDER BY area_name ASC, latitude DESC;
SELECT area_name, COUNT(*) as total_areas FROM geofencing_areas GROUP BY area_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT area_name, latitude, longitude, 2 * radius as diameter FROM geofencing_areas WHERE radius <= 50;
SELECT * FROM GeofenceAreas;
SELECT area_id, area_name FROM GeofenceAreas ORDER BY area_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM GeofenceAreas WHERE area_id = 2;
SELECT area_name, ST_AsText(polygon) FROM GeofenceAreas;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_description FROM GameEvents WHERE area_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM GameEvents WHERE area_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM GeofenceAreas WHERE area_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY area_id DESC;
SELECT event_name, area_name FROM GameEvents JOIN GeofenceAreas ON GameEvents.area_id = GeofenceAreas.area_id WHERE event_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM GameEvents WHERE area_id IS NOT NULL AND event_description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS event_count, area_name FROM GameEvents JOIN GeofenceAreas ON GameEvents.area_id = GeofenceAreas.area_id GROUP BY area_name HAVING event_count > 1 ORDER BY event_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM geofence_areas;
SELECT id, area_name, latitude, longitude FROM geofence_areas WHERE id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_type, trigger_geofence_id FROM events WHERE event_type = 'City Event';
SELECT * FROM player_challenges WHERE completed = TRUE;
SELECT player_id, challenge_name, challenge_difficulty FROM player_challenges WHERE challenge_difficulty > 5;
SELECT * FROM geofence_areas
SELECT area_name, latitude, longitude FROM geofence_areas WHERE latitude > 40
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_type FROM events ORDER BY event_type DESC
SELECT challenge_id, player_id, challenge_name, challenge_difficulty FROM player_challenges WHERE completed = TRUE
SELECT * FROM geofence_areas JOIN events ON geofence_areas.id = events.trigger_geofence_id
SELECT * FROM geofence_areas;
SELECT id, name FROM geofence_areas WHERE latitude > 50;
SELECT * FROM events ORDER BY event_name DESC;
SELECT challenge_name, requirements FROM challenges WHERE challenge_id = 1;
SELECT event_id, progress_status FROM player_progress WHERE player_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM geofence_areas ORDER BY name ASC, latitude DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM geofence_areas WHERE longitude < 0;
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_type = 'Competition' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT challenge_name, rewards FROM challenges WHERE challenge_id = 3;
SELECT player_id, event_id, progress_status FROM player_progress WHERE player_id = 101 AND progress_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM areas;
SELECT area_name, area_location FROM areas WHERE area_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players ORDER BY player_level DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_type, event_reward FROM events WHERE event_type = 'PvP';

SELECT player_name, challenge_name, players_completed_challenge FROM players JOIN player_progress ON players.player_id = player_progress.player_id JOIN challenges ON player_progress.challenge_id = challenges.challenge_id WHERE player_progress.players_completed_challenge = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM areas;
SELECT area_id, area_name, area_description FROM areas WHERE area_location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM players WHERE player_level > 5 ORDER BY player_score DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_type, event_reward FROM events WHERE event_reward > 100 ORDER BY event_type ASC;

SELECT player_name, challenge_name, players_completed_challenge FROM players JOIN player_progress ON players.player_id = player_progress.player_id JOIN challenges ON player_progress.challenge_id = challenges.challenge_id WHERE players_completed_challenge = TRUE ORDER BY player_name ASC, challenge_name DESC;
